definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Wuzhillui is the important representative of the anarchism thought in modern time of China.
sentences.chinese: 吳稚暉是中國近現代無政府主義思想的重要代表人。

sentences.english: It is in terms of the non-aggression principle that Rothbard defined anarchism;
sentences.chinese: 羅斯巴德以互不侵犯原則的形式定義了無政府主義。

sentences.english: It was a danger of totally irreligious, unanarchism.
sentences.chinese: 而是一個與宗教毫不相關，非無政府主義的危險。

sentences.english: From TianA What do you think of ideological anarchism?
sentences.chinese: 你對於意識形態上的無政府主義如何看？

sentences.english: What was the relationship between the anarchism in Ba Jin's thoughts and the revolutionary democratism?
sentences.chinese: 巴金思想中的無政府主義與革命民主主義是什麼關係？
有一位席埃拉是名無政府主義者。

sentences.english: It is a non-state actor that challenges state authority.
sentences.chinese: 它是挑戰國家權威的無政府主義組織。

sentences.english: The most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate .
sentences.chinese: 最激烈的無政府主義者，居然成了最露骨的變節者。

sentences.english: The anarchism is one kind of political ideological trend of the petty bourgeoisie which came into being in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 無政府主義是一種產生於歐洲的小資產階級政治思潮。

sentences.english: This position used to be called anarchism.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況過去稱爲無政府主義。

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
Jian Zoupianfeng, pseudonym of prolific modern novelist
the sword moves with side stroke (modern idiom)/fig. unexpected winning move/unconventional gambit
